A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just like the Force Awakens was just a bigger\, less cohesive \"A New Hope\,\" \"The Last Jedi\,\" is a bigger\, less cohesive\, \"The Empire Strikes Back.\" The lack of originality actually distracts from the transparent social justice agenda constantly pushed by the new trilogy. I hardly notices it this time until other people pointed it out.
